name: Mysteries of the Past: Shadow of the Daemon Collector's Edition
description: Set out for the mysterious location and use your abilities to lift the curtain of the dark secret that hides the mysteries behind the case.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Pentium 4 or equivalent Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 850 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Meh. It is OK for a HOG, but it is a bit clunky in terms of puzzle mechanics, and the acting is TERRible. I never use hints in HO scenes or puzzles (I do play a lot of HOGs), but with this one, I had to just to figure out what I needed to do. It is trying for different kinds of puzzles, and I do appreciate that, but mostly this is a miss. If you are itching for a HOG and this is the only option, then hey, if it's on sale, go for it. Otherwise, I would move on. FYI, if the game is not properly full-screening for you, you should still be able to select options and then switch off the full screen mode. Your screen will flicker a bit, but for me, it all came back in just fine.
